architectural_resources: AWS Lambda function (container image) — implied by Dockerfile base image public.ecr.aws/lambda/nodejs and index.handler
Amazon ECR repository + image push — implied by Makefile docker target (dkr.ecr.<region>.amazonaws.com)
Terraform-managed AWS infrastructure (expected) — implied by Makefile TF_DIR=./terraform and terraform init/plan/apply targets, though no *.tf files are present in this repository snapshot
Outbound HTTP access to a target URL provided via event.url — index.js uses page.goto(event.url)
Headless Chromium runtime dependencies inside container — Dockerfile installs system libs and runs `npx playwright install chromium`
